title: Colombia
summary: Established in 1916, Citi is the bank of choice for foreign trade, FX trading, cash management and offshore investment products. Its global network is of unique value to Colombian and multinational clients, the government, and local financial institutions, all of which require seamless connectivity, market information and transactional networks to carry out local, regional, and global activities.
tag-2: Citi is the oldest foreign financial institution in Colombia.
